Quinta-feira

10 de maio de 2023

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Servicos } from './servicos_agendar'; import { AgendamentoService } from './agendamento.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-agendamento', templateUrl: './agendamento.component.html', styleUrls: ['./agendamento.component.css'] }) export class AgendamentoComponent { servicos: Servicos[] = []; constructor(private AgendamentoService : AgendamentoService ) {} ngOnInit(){ this.AgendamentoService .getServicos().subscribe( Servicos => { this.servicos = Servicos; } ); } }
